structure.unit: Chapter 19 RESPONSIBLE PROPERTY OWNER AND MERCHANT ACT

law.catch_line: Unimproved subdivided lots; Method of enforcement.

text.section:
Sec. 19-4.1. Unimproved subdivided lots; Method of enforcement.
In cases where the compliance officer finds two or more contiguous lots within the same subdivision and under the same ownership, the lots shall be consolidated as one single enforcement action for the purposes of imposing civil penalties. Nothing in this subsection shall exempt the property owner from meeting the compliance standards or from paying the cumulative costs of enforcement and remediation for all of the lots.
